item.title: Part2 Azure DevOps Agents With Container Apps in Bicep
Part 1: Azure DevOps agents with Container apps in bicep
item.description: In my journey to find the best environment for Azure DevOps agents I have found a great solution to get scalable agents. I have tried multiple solutions for hosting the agents and I will explain the cons and pro’s of the tested solutions. Solution Pro’s Cons VM Scale set Fast, Only option when building containers Expensive Container Instances Very cheap Not easy to scale Kubernetes service Very scalable by using KEDA Expensive And then Container apps came.
